glsa.title: OSC: Shell command injection
glsa.synopsis: OSC is vulnerable to the remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: OSC is the command line tool and API for the Open Build Service.

description.p: A vulnerability has been discovered that may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in a _service file.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

workaround.p: There is no known work around at this time.

resolution.p: All OSC users should upgrade to the latest version:
